response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. I propose to sell the product to you for $12,000. This price reflects its high quality and the significant benefit it will bring to you, while also ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.", "product_price": 12000}
